pageProduct.name: Restoria Discreet Colour Restoring Shampoo 147ml
pageProduct.description:
Information

General Information

Restoria Discreet Colour Restoring Shampoo is a breakthrough shampoo that gradually & gently restores natural-looking colour to grey hair.

Use just like your regular shampoo, Restoria Discreet Colour Restoring Shampoo reduces greys a little bit with each shampoo, for subtle, natural-looking results. Use as your regular shampoo until you like what you see, then use a couple of times a week or as needed to maintain your look.

Gentle on hair:
No ammonia or peroxide.
Contains Aloe Vera & Coconut Oil.

Cleans & revitalises:
Unique formula nourishes and hydrates the hair.
Leave hair feeling stronger, thicker healthier and younger looking.

Unlike traditional hair colour:
No strong smell.
No obvious grey roots when used regularly.
As easy as using a shampoo.

Suitable for both me and women with any shade of hair.*
* Do not use on hair that has been bleached, lightened, highlighted, coloured blonde or coloured with henna.

Size: 147mL

KEY FEATURES

• Reduces grey a little bit with each shampoo.
• Cleans & revitalises hair.
• Gentle on the hair with no ammonia or peroxide.
• Unlike a traditional hair colour, it's a shampoo.
• Suitable for men & women.

Warnings

Before using read directions and safety warnings carefully. A preliminary test according to the accompany directions should be made before use. Keep Out Of Reach Of Children. Avoid contact with eyes. This product must not be used for dyeing eyelashes or eyebrows; to do so may be injurious to the eye.

Ingredients

Water, Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate, Decyl Glucoside, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycol Stearate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Fragrance, 2,4-Diaminophenoxyethanol HCl, Ethanolamine, Cetearyl Glucoside, Dimethicone, Dihydroxyindoline HBr, p-Aminophenol, Erythorbic Acid, Sodium Sulfite, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Tetraaminopyrimidine Sulfate, Stearamide AMP, 2-Amino-4-Hydroxyethylaminoanisole Sulfate, N,N-Bis (2Hydroxyethyl)-p-Phenylenediamine Sulfate, Panthenol, Manganese Sulfate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Laureth-4, Laureth-23, Sorbic Acid, Etidronic Acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Maltodextrin

Directions

Reduces grey gradually with each shampoo. Use the shampoo regularly until you reach desired results, then use a few times a week to mainatin your look and manage regrowth.
